definition: applicable to an entire class or group, any product that can be sold without a brand name
details:
adjective
- applicable to an entire class or group
= example: applicable to an entire class or group
- (of drugs) not protected by trademark
= example: (of drugs) not protected by trademark
- relating to or common to or descriptive of all members of a genus
= example: relating to or common to or descriptive of all members of a genus
noun
- any product that can be sold without a brand name
- a wine that is a blend of several varieties of grapes with no one grape predominating
= synonyms: generic wine
